## Install igraph and tidygraph


``` {r }
install.packages("igraph")
install.packages("tidygraph")
install.packages("ggraph")
```

## Load libraries

```{r }
library(tidyverse)
library(tidygraph)
library(ggraph)
library(readr)
```

## Load nodes table

```{r }
nodes <- read_csv("Ex2 - NODES.csv")
head(nodes)
```

## Load edges table

```{r }
edges <- read_csv("Ex2 - EDGES.csv")
head(edges)
```
